DOC.brief_summary: Many study demonstrate endometrial scratch significantly increase pregnancy rate patient undergo vitro fertilization embryo transfer . However , limited number study conduct frozen thaw transfer ( FET ) cycle . Nowadays , FET cycle , endometrial scratch mainly perform two different time point : 1 ) luteal phase previous cycle ; 2 ) early follicular phase current cycle . However , study compare effectiveness two different endometrial scratch method perform different timing . The aim study find best time endometrial scratch FET cycle .
DOC.criteria: To age young 40 year old ; At least one period IVFET ( fresh thaw ) do pregnant least one qualified blastocyst ( 3BB ) two qualified embryo ( II/6 ) transfer ; There qualify embryo thaw thawET period take . Malformation uterus : uterus unicorn , uterus bicorn , untreated uterus septus , etc . ; History endometrial disease : intrauterine adhesion , uterine cavity tuberculosis , severe dysplasia endometrium , etc . ; Multiple myoma endometrioma cause uterus oppression ; Multiple recurrent endometrial polyp ; Pelvic tuberculosis , endometriosis .
